text:
- [Skyy] Are you ready
for the Hubba Bubba?
This is a sexy drink, it's fun,
we made this on another platform,
but I got to show it to you here.
So, we start off with some corn syrup
and some bright pink sugar.

Rim your glass, dip it in the
sugar so you can stand out.

Trust me, your crush
is gonna love this one.

Then, we get a glass,
put in some crushed ice,

drop in gumballs, crushed
ice, gumballs, good to go.

It look like you got a
rainbow in this glass,
all eyes are on you right now.
Now, let's go and make our infused vodka,
so we grab some Hubba Bubba gum, okay,

put those in a bottle to
which we add fresh vodka,

not distilled stuff
'cause vodka does go bad.
Give that a little shake it,

it's not going to infuse
the way we did it,
you gotta let it sit.
That's movie magic you're looking at.
Now let's get onto our mix,

so we have some ice, some
infused Hubba Bubba vodka.
Hit that with some Triple Sec.
Come behind it with lemon juice.
Hit that with some pink lemonade,
come behind that with simple syrup,

and then you shake it
and you keep it sexy.

So, we pour that into our
glass over our crushed ice
and our gumballs.

Good to go, then we top
that with lemon lime soda.
That's our mix,

we drop on a couple more
gumballs as garnish,

and this the kind of
drink I'm talking about
here on Tipsy Bartender.
Sexy, eye catching, and damn delicious.
And there you have it, the Hubba Bubba.
